THUMBS_UP.label: Thumbs Up
THUMBS_UP.description: Thumb extended, all other fingers closed

PEACE.label: Peace Sign
PEACE.description: Index and middle fingers extended in V shape

INDEX_ONLY.label: Index Finger Only
INDEX_ONLY.description: Only index finger extended (no middle finger)

OK.label: OK Sign
OK.description: Thumb and index finger touching, other fingers extended

SWIPE_LEFT.label: Swipe Left
SWIPE_LEFT.description: Quick horizontal movement to the left

SWIPE_RIGHT.label: Swipe Right
SWIPE_RIGHT.description: Quick horizontal movement to the right

bindings._comment: PREDEFINED BINDINGS - mapped to built-in gestures
bindings._comment_user_defined: USER-DEFINED BINDINGS - capture landmarks and map to actions

keyboard_shortcuts_library._description: Library of useful shortcuts (copy/paste removed as they use gesture-based workflow)
